ygData.msgSnippet: animated hands are found in Unrest, and they drop Ivory bracelets, good items :) ... From:  To:  Sent: Thursday,

animated hands are found in Unrest, and they drop Ivory bracelets, good
items :)

Subject: [eqenchanters] Mythiran Tower


> From: W6275C@...
>
> Just wondering but has anyone else noticed this on the Mythiran Tower
website (straight cut and paste) "I realize this list is far from complete,
and I understand animated hands drop the enchanter recipe books" any idea if
this is true or not and if so where in the heck are animated hands?
